p: First, 0.2 g of cheese fat was homogenized with 25 ml of butanol solution. The next step was to blend 5 ml of the prepared solution and 5 ml of TBA reagent (200 mg TBA in 100 ml butanol) and heat them in a boiling water bath for 2 hr. Then, they were cooled under running water for 1 min and the absorbance was measured at 539 nm against a blank (consisting of 5 ml of TBA reagent and 5 ml butanol). The values of TBA were stated as milligram malonaldehyde (MA) per kilogram of sample (Shin, Song, Seo, & Song, 2012).
